dataSet.name: IncomeStatement

field.presentationExpression: CASE WHEN Company = VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef) THEN "NOT SPECIFIED" ELSE Company END

dataSet.query: SELECT ALLOWED SystemTitle.Value AS OurCompany, GJAD_Turnovers.Account.AccountType AS AccountType, CASE WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income) THEN "Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales) THEN "COGS" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense) THEN "Expenses" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome) THEN "Other Income" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense) THEN "Other Expenses" WHEN AccountTypes.Ref = VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense) THEN "Income Tax Expense" ELSE "" END AS AccountTypePresentation, GJAD_Turnovers.Account AS Account, GJAD_Turnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, CASE WHEN NOT GJAD_Turnovers.Account IS NULL THEN -GJAD_Turnovers.AmountRCTurnover ELSE 0 END AS AmountRCTurnover, ISNULL(TextHeader.Text, "") AS TextHeader, ISNULL(TextFooter.Text, "") AS TextFooter, ISNULL(TextTitle.Text, "") AS TextTitle, ISNULL(GJAD_Turnovers.Company, VALUE(Catalog.Companies.EmptyRef)) AS Company, ISNULL(GJAD_Turnovers.Company.Customer, FALSE) AS Customer, ISNULL(GJAD_Turnovers.Company.Vendor, FALSE) AS Vendor {SELECT AccountType.*, Account.*, Recorder, YearPeriod, QuarterPeriod, MonthPeriod, WeekPeriod, DayPeriod} FROM AccumulationRegister.GeneralJournalAnalyticsDimensions.Turnovers(, , Auto, ) AS GJAD_Turnovers FULL JOIN Enum.AccountTypes AS AccountTypes ON (AccountTypes.Ref = GJAD_Turnovers.Account.AccountType) LEFT JOIN Constant.SystemTitle AS SystemTitle ON (TRUE) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.HeadersAndFooters AS TextHeader ON (TextHeader.Report = VALUE(Enum.Reports.IncomeStatementAB)) AND (TextHeader.Type = VALUE(Enum.Partsreport.Header)) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.HeadersAndFooters AS TextFooter ON (TextFooter.Report = VALUE(Enum.Reports.IncomeStatementAB)) AND (TextFooter.Type = VALUE(Enum.Partsreport.Footer)) LEFT JOIN InformationRegister.HeadersAndFooters AS TextTitle ON (TextTitle.Report = VALUE(Enum.Reports.IncomeStatementAB)) AND (TextTitle.Type = VALUE(Enum.Partsreport.Title)) WHERE AccountTypes.Ref IN (VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Income), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.CostOfSales), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.Expense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherExpense), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.OtherIncome), VALUE(Enum.AccountTypes.IncomeTaxExpense)) {WHERE AccountTypes.Ref AS AccountType, GJAD_Turnovers.Account AS Account, GJAD_Turnovers.Recorder AS Recorder, GJAD_Turnovers.YearPeriod AS YearPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.QuarterPeriod AS QuarterPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.MonthPeriod AS MonthPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.WeekPeriod AS WeekPeriod, GJAD_Turnovers.DayPeriod AS DayPeriod}

parameter.dcsat:name: TextTitle
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN TextTitle = "" THEN "Income Statement" ELSE TextTitle END

parameter.dcsat:name: TextTitle
parameter.dcsat:expression: CASE WHEN TextTitle = "" THEN "Income Statement" ELSE TextTitle END

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")

parameter.dcsat:name: CurrentDate
parameter.dcsat:expression: Format(CurrentDate(), "DF='dddd, MMM d, yyyy h:mm:ss tt'")
